column4: How to save compiz settings? That i dont have every time i restart to do settings again
Install simple-ccsm, then select Custom in sys>prefs>appearance>visual effects
i dont have custom choice to choose in profile section?
Did you restart the appearance properties applet?
it seems i did  have simple-ccsm already installed
cant understand why cant get custom profile only default to ultimate
There should be four entries in the list. On english installs, it is None, Normal, Extra and Custom
You want the last of the four
i have default, advanced, medium, minimal, ultimate?
Either you're not using an English install, or you're looking in the wrong place
Is this a traditional ubuntu installation and if so, which version?
oh sorry, i looked at the wrong place now i have that custom option available, but it doesnt save the settings for next start up?
meaning the compiz config settings manager settings..
When you select Custom, your settings will be saved, and compiz will start by default
Install simple-ccsm and select the Custom option that will appear in sys>prefs>appearance>visual effects
